name: Of life and living
description:
Stay still, or move, dance, explore and experience life in it's most amazing form.

'Of life and living' is a comedy game / experiment made for a 1 game 1 week rapid prototyping class with the weeks theme of movement.

The game was meant to test a movement system based on dance. I rotoscoped the animation from a footloose clip and edited it into a looped movement. It's not much more than a tech demo and an internet joke so far, but I would like to put it into a fuller game at some stage.

Please enjoy and let me know what you think.
